1.title: The Cow Whisperers

episode of.title: The Three Drinkers Do Scotch Whisky (TV Series 2018– )

1.plot: The Three Drinkers begin their Scottish adventure with a bang, delving into the world of organic whiskey. They visit a £140 million distillery, attempt highland cow whispering and taste some rather bizarrely named local dishes.

2.title: Dogging and Demons

episode of.title: The Three Drinkers Do Scotch Whisky (TV Series 2018– )

2.plot: The trio learn the art of whiskey dogging before making some furry friends. They try their hand at the art of coopering before going on the hunt for the Loch Ness Monster.

3.title: Whiskey from Outer Space

episode of.title: The Three Drinkers Do Scotch Whisky (TV Series 2018– )

3.plot: The trio journey to Glenmorangie where they discover the other side of a whiskey cask. They continue their adventure, partaking in Highland Games, before setting sail for Islay where they talk peat spades and space.

4.title: Cocktails and Snails

episode of.title: The Three Drinkers Do Scotch Whisky (TV Series 2018– )

4.plot: In the final episode of this series, the Three Drinkers travel to London to discover the world of whisky cocktails. From "High Balls" to high class, they visit the number 1 bar in the world and explore a never-ending whisky tree.

imdb.plot outline: Embark on an imbibing adventure with The Three Drinkers; the travelogue trio putting spirits and entertainment side by side. Bringing the audience on a journey of discovery through Scotland, we explore the world of whiskey in a way that has never been done before. Three Friends. Zero pretense. 100% Entertainment.
